means: 颤抖， （因害怕或寒冷而）发抖( quake的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I just stood there quaking with fear.
sentence.Network_cn: 我只是站在那儿，吓得直哆嗦。

sentence.Network_en: Quaking with fear, Polly slowly opened the door.
sentence.Network_cn: 波莉吓得直发抖，慢慢地打开了门。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 聚会期间,早期的贵格会信徒通常感情尽露,发抖和颤栗(quaking),这可能是贵格会信徒名字由来的一个原因.附图为本词条添加视频和组图相关影像.
The criminals were quaking with fear as they were about to be executed., 行将处决时 , 罪犯们由于恐惧而浑身颤栗.
i stood there quaking with fear ., 我站在那里 , 害怕得直发抖.

list.abs: 1. 镇浪油sea quake 海底地震;地震海啸sea rainbow 海上虹
代理木材进口—各种进口木材的中文... ... 细长垂枝山杨 weeping aspen 美洲山杨 quaking aspen 毛果杨 black cottonwood western.
quake proof structure 耐震结构quaking concrete 塑性混凝土qualification test 资格考试
quake center 震中quake sheet 地震岩席quake 震动；颤抖

entry.def: A quake is the same as an earthquake .

example.ex: The quake destroyed mud buildings in many remote villages.
example.tran: 这次地震摧毁了许多偏远乡村的土坯房。

entry.tran: (通常指因恐惧)发抖，颤抖，哆嗦
entry.def: If you quake, you shake, usually because you are very afraid.

example.ex: I just stood there quaking with fear...
example.tran: 我只是站在那儿，吓得直哆嗦。

entry.tran: 十分紧张;非常害怕；吓得发抖
entry.def: If you are quaking in your boots or quaking in your shoes, you feel very nervous or afraid, and may be feeling slightly weak as a result.

example.ex: If you stand up straight you'll give an impression of self-confidence even if you're quaking in your boots.
example.tran: 要是你站得笔挺，就算实际上怕得要命，你都会给人留下非常自信的印象。

means.word_mean: 1. vibrating slightly and irregularly; as e.g. with fear or cold or like the leaves of an aspen in a breeze;

sentences.sentence: "sparkling light from the shivering crystals of the chandelier"

auth_sentence.content: Even British executives with only marginal activities in America are quaking.
